main event: A citizen reported seeing a UFO hovering over Oneida, New York, on November 13, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes,The object was described as illuminated in a peculiar manner but had no lights,The observer initially skeptical became convinced it was not a conventional aircraft,The Albany Police Department was informed but could not locate the object,The observer was accompanied by his wife who also witnessed the sighting.
witness description: FRED K. and his wife; FRED K. is employed by the Clark Motor Company.
